top.title: Ukraine calls for Trump-Zelensky meeting in US this week
top.summary: It comes as US and Russian officials are set to hold talks in Abu Dhabi.

top.title: Israel receives coffin that Hamas says contains Gaza hostage's body
top.summary: The remains will be transferred to Israeli forces, who will take them to Israel's forensic medicine institute for identification.

top.title: Ex-wife of Dubai royal says she fears arrest as custody battle escalates
top.summary: Zeynab Javadli's ex-husband has lodged a criminal complaint with Dubai police, accusing her of kidnapping their three daughters.

top.title: Ofcom vows to name and shame platforms over online sexism
top.summary: But critics say the regulator's new measures need to be the law rather than guidelines to make the internet safer for women and girls.

top.title: Cryptology firm cancels elections after losing encryption key
top.summary: The International Association for Cryptologic Research - created to study secure communication - said it was an "honest human mistake."

top.title: Scammers hacked her phone and stole thousands - so how did they get her details?
top.summary: Sue Shore told the BBC how scammers targeted her - and we found her information had been leaked online.

title.#text: Wyze’s new security camera watches your yard from inside your home
Bose and Sony headphones are up to $200 off in the run-up to Black Friday
Apple’s AirPods 4 are on sale starting at just $69 for Black Friday
